body.p:
In order to dress Bloggie using the open source Arcsin template, we need to complete a number of steps:
Cut out and adjust the decorator template for all our Views and place it in the template directory
Copy all the template resources (stylesheets, images, scripts) to a webserver directory
Enable the use of the decorator template in output types configuration
If needed, adjust the existing templates to fit with the new style and conventions

section.title: Configuring Bloggie to use the new decorator
